pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Bayesian Survival Analysis // A framework for estimating ensembles of parametric survival models with different parametric families. The RoBSA framework uses Bayesian model- averaging to combine the competing parametric survival models into a model ensemble, weights the posterior parameter distributions based on posterior model probabilities and uses Bayes factors to test for the presence or absence of the individual predictors or preference for a parametric family (Barto, Aust Haaf, 2021, doi:10.48550/arXiv.2112.08311). The user can define a wide range of informative priors for all parameters of interest. The package provides convenient functions for summary, visualizations, fit diagnostics, and prior distribution calibration.
